description: The hosts inventory dashboard displays a inventory list of all hosts of the selected data center and cluster.

panels.content:
###### This dashboard displays an inventory list of all hosts in the selected cluster.

###### **Note:** Number of CPUs and Memory Size ranges must contain numeric values or Null.

panels.description: This report displays a inventory list of all hosts in the selected data center and cluster.

targets.rawSql:
-- IN02-1 - This report will display a list of all hosts configuration data by Datacenter and Cluster

SELECT
    CASE 
        WHEN v4_4_configuration_history_hosts.delete_date IS NULL
            THEN 'No'
        WHEN v4_4_configuration_history_hosts.delete_date IS NOT NULL
            THEN 'Yes'
    END AS is_deleted,
    v4_4_configuration_history_hosts.cluster_id,
    v4_4_configuration_history_hosts.host_id,
    v4_4_configuration_history_hosts.host_name,
    v4_4_configuration_history_clusters.cluster_name,
    -- A fully qualified domain name ( fqdn )
    v4_4_configuration_history_hosts.fqdn_or_ip,
    v4_4_configuration_history_hosts.vdsm_version,
    v4_4_configuration_history_hosts.host_os,
    CAST ( v4_4_configuration_history_hosts.create_date AS date ) AS create_date,
    CAST ( v4_4_configuration_history_hosts.delete_date AS date ) AS delete_date
FROM 
    v4_4_configuration_history_hosts
    LEFT OUTER JOIN v4_4_configuration_history_clusters
        ON 
            (
                v4_4_configuration_history_hosts.cluster_id =
                v4_4_configuration_history_clusters.cluster_id
                -- Here we get the cluster latest configuration
                AND v4_4_configuration_history_clusters.history_id 
                    IN 
                        (
                            SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )
                            FROM v4_4_configuration_history_clusters a
                            GROUP BY a.cluster_id
                        )
            )
WHERE 
    -- Filter hosts list according to the data center that was chosen by the user
    v4_4_configuration_history_hosts.cluster_id 
        IN 
            (
                SELECT a.cluster_id
                FROM v4_4_configuration_history_clusters a
                WHERE a.datacenter_id IN ($datacenter_id)
            )
    -- Filter list according to the host/s that was chosen by the user
    AND v4_4_configuration_history_hosts.host_id IN ($host_id)
    -- Filter list according to the OS that was chosen by the user
    AND COALESCE ( v4_4_configuration_history_hosts.host_os, 'Unknown' ) IN ($host_os)
    -- Only show hosts with number of number of CPUs greater than or equal to the threshold set by the user
    AND 
        CASE
            WHEN LOWER ( '$cpu_lower_threshold' ) != 'null' AND count_threads_as_cores = TRUE
                THEN COALESCE ( number_of_threads, 0 ) >= ($cpu_lower_threshold)
            WHEN LOWER ( '$cpu_lower_threshold' ) != 'null' AND count_threads_as_cores IN ( FALSE, NULL )
                THEN COALESCE ( number_of_cores, 0 ) >= ($cpu_lower_threshold)
            ELSE 1=1
        END
    -- Only show hosts with number of number of CPUs smaller than the threshold set by the user
    AND 
        CASE 
            WHEN LOWER ( '$cpu_upper_threshold' ) != 'null' AND count_threads_as_cores = TRUE
                THEN COALESCE ( number_of_threads, 0 ) < ($cpu_upper_threshold)
            WHEN LOWER ( '$cpu_upper_threshold' ) != 'null' AND count_threads_as_cores IN ( FALSE, NULL )
                THEN COALESCE ( number_of_cores, 0 ) < ($cpu_upper_threshold)
            ELSE 1=1
        END
    -- Only show hosts with memory size greater than or equal to the threshold set by the user
    AND 
        CASE 
            WHEN LOWER ( '$mem_lower_threshold' ) != 'null'
                THEN ROUND ( CAST ( COALESCE ( memory_size_mb, 0.00 ) AS float ) :: numeric / 1024, 1 ) >= ($mem_lower_threshold)
            ELSE 1=1
        END 
    -- Only show hosts with memory size smaller than the threshold set by the user
    AND 
        CASE
            WHEN LOWER ( '$mem_upper_threshold' ) != 'null'
                THEN ROUND ( CAST ( COALESCE ( memory_size_mb, 0.00 ) AS float ) :: numeric / 1024, 1 ) < ($mem_upper_threshold)
            ELSE 1=1
        END
    -- Here we get the host latest configuration
    AND v4_4_configuration_history_hosts.history_id 
        IN     
            (
                SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )
                FROM v4_4_configuration_history_hosts a
                GROUP BY a.host_id
            )
    -- This will determine where deleted entities will be included in the report,
    -- according to the user selection for "show_deleted" parameter
    AND
        CASE
          WHEN '$show_deleted'='Yes'
              THEN 1=1
          WHEN '$show_deleted'='No'
              THEN v4_4_configuration_history_hosts.delete_date isnull
        END
ORDER BY
    v4_4_configuration_history_hosts.cluster_id,
    v4_4_configuration_history_hosts.delete_date DESC,
    v4_4_configuration_history_hosts.host_name

panels.description: This report displays a inventory list of hosts hardware details in the selected data center and cluster.

targets.rawSql:
-- IN02-2 

SELECT DISTINCT 
    CASE 
        WHEN v4_4_configuration_history_hosts.delete_date IS NULL
            THEN 'No'
        WHEN v4_4_configuration_history_hosts.delete_date IS NOT NULL
            THEN 'Yes'
    END AS is_deleted,
    v4_4_configuration_history_hosts.host_id,
    CASE 
        WHEN v4_4_configuration_history_hosts.delete_date IS NULL  	     	    
            THEN host_name 	 	
        WHEN v4_4_configuration_history_hosts.delete_date IS NOT NULL  	      	    
            THEN host_name || ' (Removed on ' || CAST ( CAST ( v4_4_configuration_history_hosts.delete_date AS date ) AS varchar ) || ')'
    END AS host_name,
    cpu_model,
    CASE
        WHEN count_threads_as_cores = TRUE
            THEN COALESCE ( v4_4_configuration_history_hosts.number_of_threads, 0 )
        ELSE COALESCE ( v4_4_configuration_history_hosts.number_of_cores, 0 )
    END AS host_cpu,
    ROUND ( CAST ( COALESCE ( memory_size_mb, 0.00 ) AS float ) :: numeric / 1024, 1 ) AS host_memsize,
    hardware_manufacturer AS "Server Manufacturer",
    hardware_product_name AS "Server Name",
    hardware_serial_number AS "Server Serial Number"
FROM 
    v4_4_configuration_history_hosts
    LEFT OUTER JOIN v4_4_configuration_history_clusters
        ON 
            (
                v4_4_configuration_history_hosts.cluster_id =
                v4_4_configuration_history_clusters.cluster_id
                -- Here we get the cluster latest configuration
                AND v4_4_configuration_history_clusters.history_id 
                    IN 
                        (
                            SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )
                            FROM v4_4_configuration_history_clusters a
                            GROUP BY a.cluster_id
                        )
            )
WHERE 
    -- Filter hosts list according to the data center that was chosen by the user
    v4_4_configuration_history_hosts.cluster_id 
        IN 
            (
                SELECT a.cluster_id
                FROM v4_4_configuration_history_clusters a
                WHERE a.datacenter_id IN ($datacenter_id)
            )
    -- Filter list according to the host/s that was chosen by the user
    AND host_id IN ($host_id)
    -- Filter list according to the OS that was chosen by the user
    AND COALESCE ( v4_4_configuration_history_hosts.host_os, 'Unknown' ) IN ($host_os)
    -- Only show hosts with number of number of CPUs greater than or equal to the threshold set by the user
    AND 
        CASE
            WHEN LOWER ( '$cpu_lower_threshold' ) != 'null' AND count_threads_as_cores = TRUE
                THEN COALESCE ( number_of_threads, 0 ) >= ($cpu_lower_threshold)
            WHEN LOWER ( '$cpu_lower_threshold' ) != 'null' AND count_threads_as_cores IN ( FALSE, NULL )
                THEN COALESCE ( number_of_cores, 0 ) >= ($cpu_lower_threshold)
            ELSE 1=1
        END
    -- Only show hosts with number of number of CPUs smaller than the threshold set by the user
    AND 
        CASE 
            WHEN LOWER ( '$cpu_upper_threshold' ) != 'null' AND count_threads_as_cores = TRUE
                THEN COALESCE ( number_of_threads, 0 ) < ($cpu_upper_threshold)
            WHEN LOWER ( '$cpu_upper_threshold' ) != 'null' AND count_threads_as_cores IN ( FALSE, NULL )
                THEN COALESCE ( number_of_cores, 0 ) < ($cpu_upper_threshold)
            ELSE 1=1
        END
    -- Only show hosts with memory size greater than or equal to the threshold set by the user
    AND 
        CASE 
            WHEN LOWER ( '$mem_lower_threshold' ) != 'null'
                THEN ROUND ( CAST ( COALESCE ( memory_size_mb, 0.00 ) AS float ) :: numeric / 1024, 1 ) >= ($mem_lower_threshold)
            ELSE 1=1
        END 
    -- Only show hosts with memory size smaller than the threshold set by the user
    AND 
        CASE
            WHEN LOWER ( '$mem_upper_threshold' ) != 'null'
                THEN ROUND ( CAST ( COALESCE ( memory_size_mb, 0.00 ) AS float ) :: numeric / 1024, 1 ) < ($mem_upper_threshold)
            ELSE 1=1
        END
    AND
        v4_4_configuration_history_hosts.history_id
            IN
                (
                    SELECT MAX (history_id)
                    FROM v4_4_configuration_history_hosts
                    GROUP BY host_id
                )
    AND
        CASE
            WHEN '$show_deleted'='Yes'
                THEN 1=1
            WHEN '$show_deleted'='No'
                THEN v4_4_configuration_history_hosts.delete_date isnull
        END
ORDER BY host_name, hardware_manufacturer, hardware_product_name

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT  
    CAST ( datacenter_id AS varchar ) AS __value, 
    CASE     
        WHEN delete_date IS NULL  	    
            THEN datacenter_name 	
        WHEN delete_date IS NOT NULL  	     
            THEN datacenter_name || ' (Removed on ' || CAST ( CAST ( delete_date AS date ) AS varchar ) || ')' 
    END AS __text 
FROM v4_4_configuration_history_datacenters 
WHERE      
    history_id          
        IN              
            (  	            
                SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )  		        
                FROM v4_4_configuration_history_datacenters a  		        
                GROUP BY a.datacenter_id 	        
            ) 	
    AND datacenter_id  	        
        IN 			    
            ( 					
                SELECT DISTINCT datacenter_id 					
                FROM v4_4_configuration_history_clusters 					
                WHERE  					    
                    cluster_id 					        
                        IN 					            
                            ( 									
                                SELECT DISTINCT cluster_id 									
                                FROM v4_4_configuration_history_hosts  								
                            ) 				
            ) 	
    AND 	   
        CASE  	       
            WHEN '$show_deleted'='Yes' 	           
                THEN 1=1 		   
            WHEN '$show_deleted'='No' 		       
                THEN v4_4_configuration_history_datacenters.delete_date ISNULL 	   
        END
list.label: Data Center
list.name: datacenter_id
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT  
    CAST ( datacenter_id AS varchar ) AS __value, 
    CASE     
        WHEN delete_date IS NULL  	    
            THEN datacenter_name 	
        WHEN delete_date IS NOT NULL  	     
            THEN datacenter_name || ' (Removed on ' || CAST ( CAST ( delete_date AS date ) AS varchar ) || ')' 
    END AS __text 
FROM v4_4_configuration_history_datacenters 
WHERE      
    history_id          
        IN              
            (  	            
                SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )  		        
                FROM v4_4_configuration_history_datacenters a  		        
                GROUP BY a.datacenter_id 	        
            ) 	
    AND datacenter_id  	        
        IN 			    
            ( 					
                SELECT DISTINCT datacenter_id 					
                FROM v4_4_configuration_history_clusters 					
                WHERE  					    
                    cluster_id 					        
                        IN 					            
                            ( 									
                                SELECT DISTINCT cluster_id 									
                                FROM v4_4_configuration_history_hosts  								
                            ) 				
            ) 	
    AND 	   
        CASE  	       
            WHEN '$show_deleted'='Yes' 	           
                THEN 1=1 		   
            WHEN '$show_deleted'='No' 		       
                THEN v4_4_configuration_history_datacenters.delete_date ISNULL 	   
        END

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT  
    CAST ( cluster_id AS varchar ) AS __value, 
    CASE     
        WHEN delete_date IS NULL  	    
            THEN cluster_name 	
        WHEN delete_date IS NOT NULL  	     
            THEN cluster_name || ' (Removed on ' || CAST ( CAST ( delete_date AS date ) AS varchar ) || ')' 
    END AS __text 
FROM v4_4_configuration_history_clusters 
WHERE      
    history_id          
        IN              
            (  	            
                SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )  		        
                FROM v4_4_configuration_history_clusters a  		        
                GROUP BY a.cluster_id 	        
            ) 	
    AND cluster_id  	        
        IN 			    
            ( 					
                SELECT DISTINCT cluster_id 					
                FROM v4_4_configuration_history_hosts 				
            ) 	
    AND 	   
        CASE  	       
            WHEN '$show_deleted'='Yes' 	           
                THEN 1=1 		   
            WHEN '$show_deleted'='No' 		       
                THEN v4_4_configuration_history_clusters.delete_date ISNULL 	   
        END    
    AND datacenter_id IN ($datacenter_id)
list.label: Cluster
list.name: cluster_id
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT  
    CAST ( cluster_id AS varchar ) AS __value, 
    CASE     
        WHEN delete_date IS NULL  	    
            THEN cluster_name 	
        WHEN delete_date IS NOT NULL  	     
            THEN cluster_name || ' (Removed on ' || CAST ( CAST ( delete_date AS date ) AS varchar ) || ')' 
    END AS __text 
FROM v4_4_configuration_history_clusters 
WHERE      
    history_id          
        IN              
            (  	            
                SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )  		        
                FROM v4_4_configuration_history_clusters a  		        
                GROUP BY a.cluster_id 	        
            ) 	
    AND cluster_id  	        
        IN 			    
            ( 					
                SELECT DISTINCT cluster_id 					
                FROM v4_4_configuration_history_hosts 				
            ) 	
    AND 	   
        CASE  	       
            WHEN '$show_deleted'='Yes' 	           
                THEN 1=1 		   
            WHEN '$show_deleted'='No' 		       
                THEN v4_4_configuration_history_clusters.delete_date ISNULL 	   
        END    
    AND datacenter_id IN ($datacenter_id)

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT   
    CAST ( host_id AS varchar ) AS __value,  
    CASE          
        WHEN delete_date IS NULL  	     	    
            THEN host_name 	 	
        WHEN delete_date IS NOT null  	      	    
            THEN host_name || ' (Removed on ' || CAST ( CAST ( delete_date AS date ) AS varchar ) || ')'  
    END AS __text  		
FROM v4_4_configuration_history_hosts  		
WHERE       		    
    history_id           			    
        IN               				
            (  	             					
                SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )  		         					
                FROM v4_4_configuration_history_hosts a  		         					
                GROUP BY a.host_id 	         				
            ) 	 			
    AND cluster_id IN ($cluster_id)  			
    AND 	    			    
        CASE  	        				    
            WHEN '$show_deleted'='Yes' 	            					    
                THEN 1=1 		    					
            WHEN '$show_deleted'='No' 		        					    
                THEN v4_4_configuration_history_hosts.delete_date ISNULL 	                
        END

WHERE       		    
    history_id           			    
        IN               				
            (  	             					
                SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )  		         					
                FROM v4_4_configuration_history_hosts a  		         					
                GROUP BY a.host_id

    AND cluster_id IN ($cluster_id)  			
    AND

            WHEN '$show_deleted'='No'

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT                   
    CASE  	    
        WHEN host_os IS NULL
            THEN 'Unknown'
        WHEN host_os IS NOT NULL
            THEN host_os 	
    END AS __text   
FROM v4_4_configuration_history_hosts  		
WHERE       		    
    history_id           			    
        IN               				
            (  	             					
                SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )  		         					
                FROM v4_4_configuration_history_hosts a  		         					
                GROUP BY a.host_id 	         				
            )
    AND host_id IN ($host_id)  			
    AND 
        CASE  	        				    
            WHEN '$show_deleted'='Yes' 	            					    
                THEN 1=1 		    					
            WHEN '$show_deleted'='No' 		        					    
                THEN v4_4_configuration_history_hosts.delete_date ISNULL 	                
        END
list.label: OS
list.name: host_os
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT                   
    CASE  	    
        WHEN host_os IS NULL
            THEN 'Unknown'
        WHEN host_os IS NOT NULL
            THEN host_os 	
    END AS __text   
FROM v4_4_configuration_history_hosts  		
WHERE       		    
    history_id           			    
        IN               				
            (  	             					
                SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )  		         					
                FROM v4_4_configuration_history_hosts a

    AND host_id IN ($host_id)  			
    AND 
        CASE

                THEN 1=1 		    					
            WHEN '$show_deleted'='No' 		        					    
                THEN v4_4_configuration_history_hosts.delete_date ISNULL 	                
        END

title: 02 Hosts Inventory Dashboard
